article_title: VIRUS SURGING: Ontario confirms another 59 COVID-19 cases - Toronto Sun

article_content: The number of confirmed COVID 19 cases in Ontario jumped by 59 overnight to 377 Cases under active investigation  either in the process of being tested or waiting to be tested  have also increased by 1 764 to 7 239 over that time period In a small spot of   2746 chars
